title: “I’m at a loss for words,” says an experienced audio describer, overwhelmed by art
content: Put on your helmet and descend into the darkness. Come with us to the bottom of the river, inside a power plant that roars loudly. In this four-part podcast, audio describer Anu Aaltonen guides you through the concrete halls of the Pyhäkoski hydroelectric power plant, where creatures glowing in the dark sing through their saxophones. […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Each Mielestäni product carries a piece of Oulu
content: The Mielestäni product series captures the spirit of Oulu2026 cultural capital year: doing things together, local pride, and stories that deserve to be seen and shared. The Mielestäni product series, created through a design collaboration between Osuuskauppa Arina, Oulu2026, and designer Susanna Sivonen, brings forward a layered pattern co‑created by the people of Oulu. The […]
creator: nina

title: The Lumo Light Festival 2026 call for proposals is now open
content: The Lumo Light Festival in Oulu, Finland, invites artists, designers, lighting professionals, students, and educational institutions to submit their proposals for the 2026 event. The Lumo Light Festival will be held from Thursday to Sunday, November The theme of the Lumo Light Festival in 2026 is The Other Side. This year, the light festival will […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Dálvemánnu celebrates Sámi culture with a diverse programme in Oulu in early February
content: The Dálvemánnu Festival brings together Sámi artists and cultural practitioners from across the northern regions. Part of the Oulu2026 European Capital of Culture programme, the festival culminates on the Sámi National Day on 6 February. The festival opens on Tuesday, 3 February at 19:00 with a concert by Hildá Länsman and Tuomas Norvio at Cultural […]
creator: Ulla Pirkola

title: Across Her World – Oulu Volunteering Women’s Club
content: Are you a woman living in Oulu? Are you passionate about volunteering and making a positive impact in the community? Do you want to connect with other women from different cultures? Join Our Club! A welcoming and inspiring space for multicultural women, a place to share experiences, discuss global and societal topics, and build meaningful […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Oulu All Star Big Band releases an album with Ingá-Máret Gaup-Juuso and Jukka Eskola
content: Album release concert at Pohjankartano Hall on Friday, February 6 Oulu All Star Big Band joins forces with Finnish Sámi yoiker, singer, and actor Ingá-Máret Gaup-Juuso on the album Davvi Oktavuohta – Northern Connection, which will be released on Sámi National Day, February 6. The ensemble celebrates the release with a concert on the same […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: President Tarja Halonen Becomes Patron of the Hymyilevä Oulu 26 Photography Project for Oulu European Capital of Culture 2026
content: President Tarja Halonen’s decision to become patron of the Hymyilevä Oulu 26 project gives the photography initiative strong moral authority and international visibility as part of Oulu European Capital of Culture 2026. Hymyilevä Oulu 26 has received wonderful news for the coming year: President Tarja Halonen has accepted the invitation to act as patron of […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: You can now apply for a Culture Companion for cultural events
content: The Culture Companion2026 programme has launched! In the participating municipalities, it is now possible to apply for a Culture Companion for example to visit museums, attend events or go for walks together. Trained volunteers offer companionship, support and the opportunity to share cultural experiences. Would you like to find a companion to attend an event, […]
creator: Lasse Launimaa

title: Oulu2026 Opening Festival Drew Massive Crowds – One of the Largest Events in Oulu’s History
content: A huge number of people gathered at the Oulu2026 Opening Festival to celebrate the launch of the European Capital of Culture year on 16–18 January. Around 200 events across Oulu city centre attracted over 250,000 visits. The programme offered a wide range of cultural experiences, from concerts to ice hockey, acrobatics to car tuning, panel discussions to pub quizzes, and from art exhibitions […]
creator: Ulla Pirkola

title: Oulu Music Video Festival Launches Its First European Music Video Competition!
content: The world’s oldest music video festival, Oulu Music Video Festival, is launching its first European music video competition, the OMVF European Music Video Competition. The competition is a continuation of the 2025 Nordic Music Video Competition. The world’s oldest music video festival, Oulu Music Video Festival (OMVF), is launching its first European music video competition, […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: The Oulu Declaration of Peace16 January 2026
content: Oulu declares Oulu Peace for the duration of the European Capital of Culture year 2026. Throughout the year, let us enjoy the richness of culture, the creative achievements of artists and residents, the bold innovations born from the connection between technology and art, and local cultural heritage in all its forms. Oulu Peace makes room […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Opening Festival: Oulu10 offers summer vibes, a senior disco, Culture companions, music and much more!
content: Oulu10 will transform this weekend into a summery oasis in the middle of winter, welcoming festival-goers on behalf of next year’s European Capital of Culture, the Latvian city Liepāja2027! On Saturday, the programme includes choir performances, a senior disco, dance shows and much more! At Oulu10 you can also learn about the Culture Companion 2026 […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Turku strongly present at the opening of Oulu’s year as Capital of Culture
content: Turku’s cultural scene is a prominent participant in the opening weekend. Turku, the European Capital of Culture in 2011, will welcome its successor with experimental visual art, animation, VJ art and a diverse range of music. This weekend, the City of Oulu will celebrate the opening of its year as the Capital of Culture 2026 […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: President Alexander Stubb to open the European Capital of Culture year in Oulu
content: President Alexander Stubb will open Oulu’s European Capital of Culture year at the Opening Festival on Friday, 16 January 2026. The President will deliver a speech at 4:00 pm at Oulu Market Square. During his visit to Oulu, President Stubb will visit Oulu Central Library Saari, the Children’s Culture Centre Kotilo, and the Oulu Art […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Tips for a Successful Festival Weekend
content: Oulu2026 Opening Festival celebrates the European Capital of Culture January 16–18, 2026. For three days, 200 events and 20 venues, the centre of Oulu transforms into a stage full of diverse events. Most of the programme is free of charge and open to everyone. As the festival weekend offeres a vast amount of program at […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Changes in traffic during the Opening Festival 16.–18.1.
content: During the Opening Festival, traffic and parking in Oulu city centre may become very busy, so please allow plenty of time to arrive. Due to the public event, the following streets will be temporarily closed to motor vehicles: The event organiser reserves the right to make all changes. creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Midnight Sun Run Oulu 2026: Route maps released!
content: The route maps for Midnight Sun Run Oulu 2026 have been released. The routes offer runners a chance to experience Oulu at its best. Along the route, runners will experience beaches, urban landscapes, well-known landmarks, as well as hidden gems. The routes have been designed with a strong focus on experience, smooth flow and Oulu’s […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: CNN joins the praise of Oulu as one of the world’s best travel destinations
content: The internationally renowned U.S. news outlet CNN has highlighted Oulu in its list “Where to Travel in 2026 – The Best Places to Visit.” CNN describes Oulu as one of the world’s most interesting travel destinations this year, with particular attention given to Oulu’s role as European Capital of Culture 2026. “CNN’s recognition comes at […]
creator: Ulla Pirkola

title: Over a million viewers – Oulu2026 launched as a shared moment for all of Finland and the world
content: An exceptional moment was experienced in Oulu at the turn of the year, as the Oulu2026: New Year’s Show brought the countdown to the European Capital of Culture year to audiences across Finland. Several thousand people gathered at the Oulu Hall to welcome the new year, while the television broadcast reached more than one million […]
creator: Ulla Pirkola

title: Visit Opening Celebrations Across the Oulu2026 Region!
content: The European Capital of Culture year doesn’t start in just one place — it begins in dozens! While the Oulu2026 celebrations start in Oulu 16-18 Jan during the Opening Festival, festivities will be held across the entire Oulu2026 region starting from the turn of the year. Oulu2026 – European Capital of Culture officially kicks off […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Performances on energy, war and issues surrounding communication – the performance artists for the ARToulu art area have been selected
content: A series of performances will activate and enliven public spaces in Oulu from street corners to libraries in 2026 as part of the ARToulu art area. An open call for performances and ephemeral art was held in September 2025 for ARToulu art area. The call was curated by artist Nestori Syrjälä. The selected artists are […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Hymyilevä Oulu 26 and Oulu Pride – Diversity makes the city stronger
content: Hymyilevä Oulu 26 and Oulu Pride ry work together to bring photography, art and human rights together. The collaboration highlights diversity, the power of smiles and stories that help build a more open and inclusive city. Hymyilevä Oulu 26 and Oulu Pride ry work together to bring the power of art and photography together with […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Tips for the Opening Festival: Weekend at Central Library Saari and Children’s Cultural Centre Kotilo!

An open community opening ceremony with speeches and coffee will be held on Saturday, featuring greetings from the Minister of Science and Culture Mari-Leena Talvitie, […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Tips for the Opening Festival: Northern Sounds on Central Stages
content: For three days in January, the city centre of Oulu will be transformed into a venue for a variety of events. title: Opening Festival Highlights: Dance and Circus Take Over Central Spaces!
content: Exciting performances and circus acts in Valkea At Kauppakeskus Valkea during the festival weekend, you can enjoy a variety of dance and circus-inspired performances, including: Community dancing at the Market Square Warm up in the cold with dance and movement in the heart of the city: On stage at Rotuaari On Saturday at Rotuaari Square: […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Opening Festival Tips: Evening Program Feat. previous European Capitals of Culture — Quizzes, Senior Disco & Eurovision Fun!
content: Get ready for an exciting international evening program during the Oulu2026 Opening Festival as former European Capitals of Culture take over the city’s pubs and Oulu10, offering entertainment throughout the weekend. Turku2011 goes 45Special The Turku2011 program brings music, animation, DJ culture, and experimental visual art to club venues on Friday and Saturday: EU Lounge […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Sámi art fills the theatre and art museum during the Oulu2026 Opening Festival weekend
content: On Friday 16th January, an unprecedented moment will be experienced at the Oulu Theatre when the Sámi opera Ovllá receives its world premiere. The work is told from the perspective of the Sámi, the only Indigenous people of the Nordic countries, and addresses the painful consequences that state-led oppression has left on ever new generations. […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Opening Festival: Explore the Oulu2026 Region at Pekuri!
content: During the festival weekend, partner municipalities will bring their colourful greetings into the festival atmosphere at Pekuri Shopping Centre! creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Opening Festival: Tips for younger visitors and families
content: Plenty to Experience at the Market Square There’s lots to see and do at the Oulu Market Square throughout the weekend. creator: Anna Huovinen

title: BBC names Oulu among the world’s 20 best places to travel in 2026
content: In recent months, Oulu has gained remarkable international recognition as a travel destination, appearing on several best-of lists compiled by leading media outlets and travel platforms. Even so, many locals were surprised when the BBC published its latest list of the world’s best places to travel. Oulu features alongside globally renowned destinations such as Abu […]
creator: Ulla Pirkola

title: Running, culture and the magic of the midnight sun – Midnight Sun Run Oulu 2026
content: On July 4th 2026, we run under the midnight sun, surrounded by art and culture in Oulu. Midnight Sun Run Oulu is a new running event that combines sports, culture and northern nature in a unique way. Midnight Sun Run Oulu was created from the idea of making a running event with a small twist. […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: A Cup of Culture is filled with cultural richness
content: The Cup of Culture Event is going to open the celebration of Oulu2026 European Capital of Culture in Kajaani on Friday 23th of January 2026 at Seminaarin taidekampus. The event offers a unique opportunity to get together celebrating the diversity of traditions and cultures. The stage of the Seminaarin taidekampus will feature pieces of dance, […]
creator: Lasse Launimaa

title: The works of the Sápmi Triennial create a dialogue across borders and generations
content: The first Sápmi Triennial brings together 28 artists and Northern art and cultural organisations. In Oulu Art Museum the triennial’s works will be integrated into the Eanangiella – Voice of the Land exhibition. For the first few months of the European Capital of Culture year, the Oulu Art Museum will be transformed into a Sámi […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Memory of the Landscape – A Short Film Revealing Northern Stories Ahead of the Capital of Culture Year
content: The short film Memory of the Landscape takes viewers from the valleys of the Oulujoki River to the dunes of Rokua and the open waters of Lake Oulujärvi, revealing the layers of northern nature and culture on the threshold of the European Capital A new short film, Memory of the Landscape, was filmed during the […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Dálvemánnu offers great concerts and rare experiences in February
content: The Dálvemánnu Festival brings together Sámi artists and creatives from across the North. The festival, part of Oulu’s European Capital of Culture programme, culminates on the Sámi National Day on 6 February.  Dálvemánnu is launched with a concert by Hildá Länsman and Tuomas Norvio at the Cultural Centre Valve on Tuesday 3 February at 19:00. title: Celebrate International Volunteer Day in Oulu and Kajaani!
content: You are warmly invited to join the celebrations for International Volunteer Day in Oulu at Valkea’s Kesäkatu on 5 December from 16:00 to 19:00, and in Kajaani at Café Mokka from 16:00 to 17:30! This special day highlights the diverse and meaningful work that volunteers do, celebrates their contributions, and raises awareness of how important […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Seven major artworks for expansive Climate Clock art trail, launching 13 June 2026
content: Oulu2026 in Northern Finland announces the seven artworks that will form Climate Clock, one of the most significant productions of the European Capital of Culture programme. Launching on 13 June 2026, this landmark project brings together leading Finnish and international artists in a permanent public art trail across the Oulu region — creating a lasting […]
creator: Lasse Launimaa

title: Seeking a Location for the Fifth Oulu2026 Mural in the City Centre
content: Oulu is the European Capital of Culture in 2026. To celebrate the anniversary year, the fifth artwork in the Oulu2026 mural series will be created in the city centre, and a suitable location is now being sought. The mural will be placed on a building whose façade is suitable for a large-scale artwork. The artist […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: THE LONG-TERM COOPERATION BETWEEN JAPAN AND FINLAND PRESENTS NORTHERN BORDER REGIONS
content: Japan and Finland share many similarities. Both face rural depopulation, environmental changes, and the disappearance of local cultures. Exhibition by two photographers explores traditional lifestyles and captures the beauty of time’s passage. Photographer Naoko Chiba and visual artist Antti Ylönen are collaborating on a photography exhibition for 2026. The exhibition will tour the municipalities along […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Child’s Day Award to Oulu International Children’s and Youth Film Festival
content: Minister of Science and Culture Mari-Leena Talvitie has presented the Child’s Day Award to RanKids association in Joensuu and the Oulu International Children’s and Youth Film Festival. title: Brands Like Bands launches its most international edition ever, concluding in Oulu, the cultural heart of Europe in 2026
content: Brands Like Bands, the world’s only festival of company-formed bands, launches its most global tour in 2026 across seven countries, ending in Oulu, Finland — the world’s happiest nation and European Capital of Culture. It’s called Brands Like Bands, it was born in Portugal, and after 13 editions and appearances at festivals such as Rock […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: From the Nile to the North: GEM’s Global Opening Reaches the Heart of Finland in Oulu
content: On the evening of 1 November 2025, cultures met across continents. In Oulu, a city preparing for its year as European Capital of Culture 2026, residents gathered to share a unique moment of global heritage, the official opening of the Grand Egyptian Museum (GEM) in Cairo, streamed live to northern Finland as part of Oulu’s […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Nokia Lumo Art & Tech Festival’s main partner – technology and art meet in Oulu
content: The Lumo Art & Tech Festival aims to establish itself as a renowned international event that brings together science, technology, and digital art.
creator: nina

title: The artist for the fifth Oulu2026 mural will be selected through an open portfolio call
content: An artist is being sought through an open portfolio call to create the fifth mural in the Oulu2026 mural series. The selected artist will realize the work in central Oulu in June 2026. The call is open from 12 November to 7 December 2025. Oulu will be the European Capital of Culture in 2026. To […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: A Hotel Room Like the Sea – A Bold Experiment by an Oulu Artist Brings the “Sea” to Original Sokos Hotel Arina for the 2026 Capital of Culture Year
content: How about spending a night in the middle of an artwork that feels like the sea? To celebrate the Oulu2026 European Capital of Culture year, Original Sokos Hotel Arina is opening a new, art hotel room called Ode to Maritime Oulu. The room “Ode to Maritime Oulu” has been created in collaboration with the Oulu-based […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: Nallikari SnowFest 2026 brings the world’s top snow sculptors to Oulu in February – nearly 30 teams from over 15 countries applied
content: The sculptors for Nallikari Snowfest 2026 have been selected. Nearly 30 applicants from over 15 countries applied. The international snow sculpting competition Nallikari SnowFest will make a grand return in February 2026 – bigger than ever. Held in the seaside district of Nallikari, Oulu, the event has become one of the most significant cultural experiences […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: The World’s Northernmost Light Festival, awarded ski resort and the magical northern lights invite you and your family to visit Ruka-Kuusamo, Lapland, Finland this winter
content: Ruka-Kuusamo in Finnish Lapland is a dream destination for anyone seeking peace, enjoyment, and extraordinary winter experiences. The region on the Arctic Circle offers one of the longest snow seasons in Europe, spectacular Arctic scenery, and a wide Since 2017, the Polar Night Light Festival has transformed the dark Arctic polar night winter of Ruka-Kuusamo […]
creator: Anna Huovinen

title: HOKKA to debut at New Year’s Celebration: Oulu2026 Show
content: Singer-songwriter Joel Hokka, having already made a significant international career with Blind Channel, returns to music with his new band HOKKA. The band is set to make its live debut at the European Capital of Culture year’s kick-off event, New Year’s Celebration: Oulu2026 Show, on New Year’s Eve. With the first single released on 11 […]
creator: Katri Dahlström

content: Tornio-based artists Teija and Pekka Isorättyä will start the Everyone’s Birthdays event series at the Aine Art Museum in January 2026. Tornio-based artists Teija and Pekka Isorättyä will start the Everyone’s Birthdays event series at the Aine Art Museum in January 2026.
